sentence: tweeted: The RNC is censuring Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger because they are trying to find out what happened on January 6thHUH?? Sen. Mitt Romney (R., Utah) tweeted: Shame falls on a party that would censure persons of conscience, who seek truth in the face of vitriol.? The Jan. 6 panel has expressed interest in speaking with former Vice President Mike Pence.
author: Siobhan Hughes
title: Cheney, Kinzinger Censured by RNC as Trump Rift Widens
